name: Pixelball (buffaloHD)
description:
Click to launch the player across the screen towards the cursor. Pickup colored circles for points, avoid damage-dealing black dots. Getting a high enough score in each level unlocks the next. Check the settings menu with space to switch between modern and retro tracks for each level.

The three green bars at the bottom of the screen represent the player’s health. Launching the player or colliding with a black enemy dot will deplete a bar of this health. Once all bars are depleted, a timer will begin that destroys the player on completion. Collide with colored (red, green, blue, gold, white) dots to replenish charges and gain points!
